articles.author: Story by Susanne Gargiulo and Reuters
articles.title: Russia's war on Ukraine prompts Denmark to vote to join EU shared defense policy - CNN
articles.description: Danes overwhelmingly voted to join the European Union's defense policy on Wednesday, in yet another sign of how Russia's invasion of Ukraine is reshaping the bloc's security landscape.

articles.author: Laurence Norman
articles.title: Europe Overcomes Hungary’s Veto on Russian Oil Embargo—at a Price - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: By holding up a deal on oil sanctions for weeks, Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban exposed the EU’s divisions on how ambitiously to target Moscow’s coffers in response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content: Two weeks into Russias invasion of Ukraine, Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban warned that his support for international sanctions on Moscow would only go so far. It took months for the European U… [+321 chars]

articles.author: Emer Moreau
articles.title: UK airlines under fire for jubilee and summer getaway chaos - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Airlines for Europe, which represents EU airlines, predicted the problem would continue ‘for a good chunk of the summer season’.
articles.content:
BRITAINS AIRPORTS ARE coming under fire for failing to prepare for this weeks jubilee bank holiday, as well as the upcoming summer season, as passengers face long delays and cancelled flights.

articles.title: Ukraine war: EU bans imports of most Russian oil - CTV News
